name: writeLog
description: Writes a message to a log file.

params.name: text
params.description: Message to log. The date / time will be logged automatically for you.

params.name: type
params.description: Type or severity of the log message

params.name: application
params.description: Logs the application name, if it is specified in Application.cfc or a cfapplication tag.

params.name: file
params.description: The file name to log to. You cannot specify a directory path or file extension (extension will be `.log`). If the file does not exist, it is created automatically. The log file will be located in your CF server logs directory.

params.name: log
params.description:
If you omit the file attribute, writes messages to standard
 log file. Ignored, if you specify file attribute.

 Application: writes to Application.log, normally used for
 application-specific messages.
 Scheduler: writes to Scheduler.log, normally used to log
 the execution of scheduled tasks.

examples.title: Simple writeLog Code Example
examples.description: Logs an order processed successfully message to `orders.log` which will be located in the CF logs directory, eg: `{cf.root}/cfusion/logs/`
